column4: Hey, I'm having some trouble updating with apt-get update or ubuntu updates or anything synaptic related really. Problem is I'm getting a Hash Sum problem and i'm also getting an error saying a GPG error. Anyone have any idea how I can fix this or update my keys perhaps? I figure it's a key problem although I could be wrong. What I have tried is clearning out /var/cache/apt/archives, using apt-get clean, switching servers between differ

A error occurred during the signature verification...... GPG error: http://packages.medibuntu.org lucid Release... signatures were invalid: BADSIG 2EBC26B60C5A2783 Medibuntu Packaging Team... Failed to fetch http://packages.medibuntu.org/dists/lucid/Release
